name: Interactive Factorial Guessing
statement: Oh no, this wicked jury hides something from you again, and you need to guess it interactively. This time, you need to find an integer $$$n$$$. To do that, you can make at most 10 queries of the form "What is the $$$k$$$-th decimal digit of the product of all integers from 1 to $$$n$$$ (also known as factorial and denoted as $$$n!$$$)?".
